#summary An automated installer for the Windows ShotFactory

*Download*[[BR]]
Download from [http://www.fpow.net/shotsetup.exe] and follow instructions in InstallFactoryWindows

*When is ShotSetup updated?*[[BR]]
Whenever an update is released that affects the Windows operating system.[[BR]]

*What Operating Systems are supported?*[[BR]]
Microsoft Windows 98/ME/2000/XP. Due to current compatability issues, Vista is NOT supported!
